name: Coded
body:
### Built in New Zealand

Because there's no place quite like it. Kiwis build world-class applications and participate in the bleeding edge development of the global web. Let's celebrate our work!


### The Badge

If you're a developer, designer, or some kind of kiwi involved in any way, show it off! Stick this badge onto your website or into your web app.

`<insert badges>`


### Not a coder?

The [By A Kiwi](http://by-a.kiwi.nz) initiative isn't restricted to coders and web apps only. If you feel like your field of work deserves recognition and celebration, [tell us about it](https://github.com/ByAKiwi/byakiwi.github.com/issues/new?title=New%20Category:%20%3Csomething%20cool%3E&body=I%20think%20%3Csomething%20cool%3E%20should%20be%20added%20on,%20and%20here%27s%20why:). New Zealand is great at many things, let's show 'em off!

### Who's showing it off?

`<insert favicons>`
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
